Binary: bemenu, libbemenu0, libbemenu-wayland, libbemenu-x11, libbemenu-curses, libbemenu-dev
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), libncurses-dev, libpango1.0-dev, libwayland-dev, libx11-dev, libxinerama-dev, libxkbcommon-dev, pkg-config, wayland-protocols, scdoc
Description: Dynamic menu inspired by dmenu bemenu is a dynamic menu for tty (using ncurses), X11 and/or Wayland, inspired by dmenu. It reads a list of newline-separated items from standard input. When the user selects an item and presses Return, their choice is printed to standard output and bemenu terminates. Entering text will narrow the items to those matching the tokens in the input.
Package-List: bemenu deb x11 optional arch=any libbemenu-curses deb libs optional arch=any libbemenu-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libbemenu-wayland deb libs optional arch=any libbemenu-x11 deb libs optional arch=any libbemenu0 deb libs optional arch=any
Uploaders: Peter Colberg <peter@colberg.org>, Tzafrir Cohen <tzafrir@debian.org>, Jochen Sprickerhof <jspricke@debian.org>,
